caption: Fetch ERC-721 Metadata
doc: Get metadata for a ERC-721 NFT.

AKK.caption: NFT Contract Address
AKK.doc: The NFT contract address of the ERC-721 you are fetching metadata from.
AKK.name: nft_contract_address

AKL.caption: Token ID
AKL.doc: The NFT token ID of the ERC-721 you are fetching metadata from.
AKL.name: token_id

AKM.caption: RPC URL
AKM.doc: Provide a RPC url for the network the NFT you are fetching information from is deployed on.
AKM.name: default_provider
